gingerbread.translation[0].definitions[0: a heavy sweet cake or a biscuit with ginger in it
gingerbread man (=a piece of gingerbread in the shape of a man)
gingerbread.translation[0].definitions[1: complicated decorations on the outside of a house, especially near the roof
gingerbread.translation[1].definitions[0: the ame of a British organization which provides support and practical help for single parents and their children. In 2007, it combined with the National Council for One Parent Families to form One Parent Families/Gingerbread before shortening its name to Gingerbread again in 2009.
